name: Gay Tour
description: Richard Nahem of Eye Prefer Paris Tours is a savvy, gay ex-New Yorker and is happy to show you his neighborhood the Marais, the gay district of Paris. The tour includes historic architecture dating from the 1600s, the chicest clothing and home boutiques, great food shops and markets, as well as contemporary art galleries. Richard will also point out bars, cafes and clubs, and share practical facts about gay life in the city and a sense of the community.
